The browsing tools are the address bars as well as all the tools that are in the left panel of development windows in normal mode. They help find an item in the system, such as a class, a cluster, a feature, some text, ... They include the
10_address_bars/00_introduction.xml address bars , the
20_cluster_tool/00_introduction.xml cluster tool , the
30_feature_tool/00_introduction.xml feature tool , the
40_favorites_tool/00_introduction.xml favorites tool ,the
50_windows_tool/00_introduction.xml windows tool and the
60_search_tool.xml search tool .
